LanguageData.CarboFibre.label: Carbon Fibre
LanguageData.CarboFibre.description: A synthetic carbon reinforced polymer material used in building a variety of structures and items. Good resistance to heat.
LanguageData.CarboPitch.label: Pitch
LanguageData.CarboPitch.description: A synthetic precursor chemical. While it is useless on its own, it is used in the production of other carbon based synthetic materials.
LanguageData.CarboPlasteel.label: CarboPlasteel
LanguageData.CarboPlasteel.description: An extremely strong carbon/plasteel laminate material used in building a variety of structures and items.
LanguageData.CarboSynth.label: CarboSynth
LanguageData.CarboSynth.description: Synthetic Carbon fibre based cloth. It has a good tolerance for heat.
LanguageData.RimPlasGraphene.label: Graphene
LanguageData.RimPlasGraphene.description: An extremely strong synthetic carbon based material used in building a variety of structures and items. It also has a good tolerance to heat and useful electrical properties. The material is more effective against compression or blunt related damage but still effective otherwise.
